'''Preview 1.21.130.25''' is the fourth ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.130]], released only for Windows on October 31, 2025,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40774360073997-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-25-Windows-Hotfix|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.25 (Windows Hotfix)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 31, 2025}}</ref> which addresses issues relating to IME input.
